title: Member Lecture: Rodin—Sculptor and Storyteller
hero_caption: <p>Auguste Rodin. <em>Adam</em>, modeled about 1881, cast about 1924. Gift of Robert Allerton.</p>
description:
Hear from Emerson Bowyer, Searle Associate Curator of European Painting and Sculpture, and gain a deeper understanding of the evolution and enduring significance of figures from Rodin's iconic Gates of Hell.

Closed captioning will be available for this lecture.

For additional member programs, please visit the member programs calendar.

To request accessibility accommodation for this program, please call (312) 443-3135 or e-mail access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible. Please visit the museum’s accessibility page for more information.
